ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Van Helsing vs. Dracula
ComicInfo.Summary:
GOD OF LIES
Hades returns to Helsing, but his confession might tear them apart again. As the former god of hell delves into the truth about Dracula's origin, Dracula begins amassing a legion of his followers to paint the streets of London red. The final conflict between Liesel Van Helsing and Dracula is brewing... and only one of them will survive.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mike Lilly & Wes Hartman | 1 | B | Cover B | Emilio Laiso & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Paul Green | 3 | D | Cover D | Renato Rei & Wes Hartman | 4 | E | Secret Retailer Exclusive Cover | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | Note: The digital edition (12/30/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
